short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that'll improve your productivity using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This AI-powered Chrome extension significantly boosts productivity. It leverages artificial intelligence to automate tasks, streamline workflows, and provide intelligent assistance, ultimately saving you time and effort. 
Features: The extension provides a variety of features to improve productivity and respects users privacy.
*AI-Powered Actions:
- Smart text summarization for quick overviews of long content.
- Drafting email replies or content using AI.
- Generating main talking points from text.
- Elaborating on a text content or changing the tone
* Translation
- Ability to translate the selected text into various languages
*SEO Tools:
- SEO keyword suggestions.
- Analyzing user intent for better content targeting.
- Providing content optimization ideas.
- Generating headlines and content ideas for SEO improvement.
*Custom Prompts:
- Ability to run user-defined custom prompts for specific tasks. This will appear as a floating input where the user can write their custom prompt/task on the selected text.
*AI Chat Panel:
A floating chat panel that appears on the right side that allows a user to start a chat and ask follow up questions
*Gmail integration:
Gmail-style buttons and dropdowns for seamless integration with existing interfaces. This will allow the user to draft email responses in seconds.
*Customization Options:
Users can provide their own API keys for Gemini and ChatGPT to use their services.
*Closing button:
Close the floating menu.

The specific functionalities will vary depending on the extension's capabilities, but the core aim remains consistent: to enhance user productivity through the power of AI.
